SELECT di.SourceId,di.SourceName,di.Longt,di.Lat,COUNT(hd.DangerId) AS num, di.Rank FROM TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di JOIN TB_BASE_COMPANY_INFO ci ON di.CompanyId=ci.CompanyId JOIN TB_BASE_HIDDEN_DANGER hd ON di.SourceId=hd.DangerSource
WHERE di.SourceId IS NOT NULL
AND ci.CompanyName LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{searchCompanyName},'%'))
AND di.SourceName LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{searchSourceName},'%'))
AND di.Rank = #{searchRank}
AND hd.Rank=#{searchRankHidden}
AND hd.DangerId IS NOT NULL AND isnull(hd.Rectification,'')!='已整改' GROUP BY di.SourceId,di.SourceName,di.Longt,di.Lat,di.Rank

SELECT hd.*,di.SourceName,ci.CompanyName FROM TB_BASE_HIDDEN_DANGER hd JOIN TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di ON hd.DangerSource=di.SourceId JOIN TB_BASE_COMPANY_INFO ci ON di.CompanyId=ci.CompanyId
WHERE di.SourceId=#{sourceId}
WHERE ci.CompanyName LIKE concat(concat('%',#{searchName}),'%')
AND isnull(hd.Rectification,'')!='已整改'
